name: Shield Strike
description:
Shield Strike: Defend and Deflect is a game made entirely from scratch in under 3 days for MiniJam #121: Reflection by @VashDev and @poliwag!

Move your shielded hero with WASD. Block enemy projectiles by facing towards them, and reflect them with your magic shield by pressing spacebar! You can hold spacebar to continue reflecting, but be careful, your shield meter drains quickly. You can also get a perfect guard if you raise your shield within a strict timing window of when the projectile comes in contact with it!
